Package.Name: Silverlight 4 Training Course

Overview.Description: The Silverlight 4 Training Course includes a whitepaper explaining all of the new Silverlight 4 RC features, several hands-on-labs that explain the features, and a 8 unit course for building business applications with Silverlight 4. The business applications course includes 8 modules with extensive hands on labs as well as 25 accompanying videos (videos are all available in the online at http://r.ch9.ms/sl4) that walk you through key aspects of building a business application with Silverlight. Key aspects in this course are working with numerous sandboxed and elevated out of browser features, the new RichTextBox control, implicit styling, webcam, drag and drop, multi touch, validation, authentication, MEF, WCF RIA Services, right mouse click, and much more!
Overview.Title: Silverlight Training Course (Silverlight 4)
Overview.Feedback: To give feedback please write to jopapa@microsoft.com

Unit.Description: Find out what enhancements Silverlight 4 RC introduces! This unit contains a video introduction of Silverlight 4 and a technical whitepaper that walks through the new features in Silverlight 4 RC
Unit.Name: What's New in Silverlight 4

Unit.Description: Check out these 5 hands on labs that demonstrate some of the newest features in Silverlight. Explore multi touch, drag and drop, numerous out of browser features, learn to interact with the webcam, create a rich text notepad using the RichTextBox control, printing your content, and more!
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 New Features

Unit.Description: This is module 2 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module sets the stage with the course's Event Manager application. It discusses using WCF services vs WCF RIA Services. Then it walks you through integrating WCF RIA Services into the solution to support reading, editing and inserting entities. This unit also covers the key aspects of data binding and page navigation.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 2 - Event Manager using WCF RIA Services

Unit.Description: This is module 3 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers authentication, using the DataForm, setting up validation for the model, the RichTextBox control, implicit styling, commanding, and the fundamentals of MVVM.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 3 - User Registration with Authentication, Validation, Rich Text, Styling, and Commands

Unit.Description: This is module 4 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers dropping a file onto a Silverlight application, programmatic clipboard acces, and accessing the webcam.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 4 - User Profile with Drop Target, Webcam, Clipboard

Unit.Description: This is module 5 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers grouping in a DataGrid and an ItemsControl. It also covers the new Fluid UI visual states, right mouse click, and word based text trimming.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 5 - Schedule Planner with Grouping and Right Click

Unit.Description: This is module 6 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers the fundamentals of printing in Silverlight. It also offers some techniques for printing multiple pages.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 6 - Printing the Schedule

Unit.Description: This is module 7 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers several out of browser features including creating toasts, window placement, elevated trust, and native integration.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 7 - Event Dashboard Running Out of Browser

Unit.Description: This is module 8 of the Building Business Applications with Silverlight 4 course. This module covers more out of browser features including creating custom chrome, the window closing event, silent installs, and XAP signing. It also covers MEF and ow it enables composability, supports a plug in model, and can dynamically load XAP files.
Unit.Name: Silverlight 4 Business Apps: Module 8 - Advanced Out of Browser and MEF
